alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 30 at 7:53PM MDT until October 01 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Northwest San Juan Mountains and Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River. In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River
